data.text: @VandanJhaveri Mr Jhaveri, our Customer Relations team has reverted to your email on 19/11/2022 at 13:21 hrs. We'd request you to revert to the same email for further clarification. ~Linda

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @gautama2004 Hi, we regret to know this. Could you please let us know your PNR with us via DM? Please know that you may always avail plan B link click here https://t.co/2OUXTgJRNo to book an alternate flight or cancel at no charge.~Vaishali
@gopalantravels Hi, we request you to share the PNR and your contact number via DM so we may connect with you for assistance in this regard. Thanks.~Vaishali

@Srivatson04 Sir, we see our airport team tried to assist you to the best of their abilities. Further, we will share your feedback with the baggage handling team to be more careful. We hope to give you a better experience the next time you choose to fly with us. ~Linda

data.text: @JChauhan_India Ms Chauhan, we regret to see you disappointed. We always wish to assist our customers. Please share the PNR via DM so we may get it checked and update you. Thanks.~Vaishali
@vandhnababu Hi, this doesn't seem right. Could you please share your PNR/ contact details via DM so we may look into it?~Vaishali

data.text: @sahajadSk15 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. We believe our Customer Relations Team is already in contact with you. You may revert to the same trail mail for further assistance. ~Ojasvi
@ankesh_nimavat Hi, this is not the service we intend to provide to our customers. We are sharing this with the concerned team right away and will provide an update at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@itz_akhil Sir, we are concerned to hear this. Please share your PNR via DM so we can assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@sksahu65236559 Hi, this doesn't seem right to us. Please help us with the PNR and a copy of the PIR issued by the arrival staff via DM so we can check and assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@Mukti_Guchhait Hi, you may web check-in 48 hrs to 60 min prior to the flight departure. ~Ojasvi
@RangeelaChacha_ Hi, you can carry a power bank of up to 30000 mAh in your Hand Luggage. ~Ojasvi

@drswapnarohit Sir, we are concerned to know this. Rude behavior is not at all acceptable. Further, we are sharing your feedback with the concerned team for review and necessary staff briefing to avoid such instances in the future. ~Ojasvi

@rmantha2 @DGCAIndia Sir, we tried reaching out to you on the registered contact number. While you can certainly complete the web check-in with the auto-assigned seats 3-10 hrs prior to departure. We’ve shared the boarding passes on the registered email id. We looking forward to welcoming you soon.

urls.title: Flight Cancellation, Charges & FAQs - IndiGo
urls.description: Cancel your IndiGo flight or booking with the step by step guide to flight cancellation. Know the cancellation charges for domestic and international bookings.

data.text: @RPoladiya Hi, please visit https://t.co/M9kC69bzyt to cancel the booking with applicable charges. ~Ojasvi

@ManuPraful Sir, we regret to hear this. Please be assured that our pilots undergo rigorous training to handle any such situation in an efficient manner. However, we are sharing your feedback with the concerned team for review. ~Ojasvi
@shiitiiz Hi, please share your registered email ID along with the transaction details via DM so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@codic_int Hi, you do not require a transit visa if you do not exit the security area of the airport and your entire booking is under a single PNR with IndiGo. Hope this clarifies your doubt. ~Ojasvi
@pawansoodin Hi, please share your PNR via DM so we can check and advise. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@MahataSushobhan Hi, please know that it is mandatory to carry a hard copy of your Student ID at the time of check-in for verification. You may also visit bit,ly/2CeYrc4 for more information. ~Ojasvi
@Ripple8130 Hi, for further assistance do let us know.~ Nandita

urls.title: Change your flight in easy steps - IndiGo
urls.description: Change your IndiGo flight with the step by step guide to flight change. Know the flight change charges for domestic and international bookings, at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @uttamdevda2 Sir, you may visit https://t.co/8dBZHhDBOq to reschedule your flight with applicable charges. Do let us know via DM in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@mukkupandey Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. We are raising this with the concerned team right away and will get back to you with an update soon. ~Ojasvi
Come explore #Chennai with us. #goIndiGo #6ETours https://t.co/v1wPAiMF7z
@yugleshdevikar Sir, please know that effective 21st November'22 the same will be applicable on all inbound and outbound flights to/from UAE. ~Nandita
@MrAbhishekSurya Sir, we are concerned to know what went wrong. We request you to share your experience in detail via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@sudeeptiwari03 Sir, please know that in domestic travel customers are allowed to carry 15 kg of check-in baggage and 7 kg of hand luggage. Further,  we request you to allow us some time. We are getting this checked and will get back to you .~ Nandita
@Saurabh26946436 Thank you for your kind words, Sir. We hope our team was able to reunite you with the luggage. We look forward to another opportunity to welcome you on board. ~Kritika

data.text: @anuragkulkarni Mr Kulkarni, we truly regret the inconvenience. This is not the service we wish to render to our customers. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll share the feedback with the concerned team right away for necessary review. We hope to serve you better in the future. ~Ojasvi
@justm0rph3u5 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll assist you at the earliest. Thanks ~Ojasvi

@MalpaniYuvraj Hi, that's certainly not good to see. At times, the seat cushion gets adrift from its Velcro. The same can be re-positioned. Further, we have duly noted your feedback and will share it with the concerned team for review. We hope to serve you better in the future. ~Ojasvi
@LegendreSaikat Mr Chatterjee, this is music to our ears. We are glad to know we could provide you with the best service. We will pass on your kudos right away! ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo
@vkmallips Sir, we regret the hassle. This is not the experience we wish our customers to have. We hope to provide you with a better flying experience in the future.~ Nandita
@AmitMan22093039 Mr Manhas, as checked, the voucher details are sent to your registered email id. We request you to check your mailbox. Further, we hope to serve you better in the future.~ Nandita
@PoIkadot1863 Sir, we request you to share your PNR and contact details via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@AshishBhatt91 Sir, please know that for the domestic sector customers are allowed to carry 15 kg of check-in baggage. We request your understanding.~ Nandita

@pankajc79229214 @airsewa_MoCA @MoTCAmv Sir, this is not the service we intend to provide. Please let us know if the same was reported to the arrival staff. If yes, please DM us the PIR copy issued by the arrival airport so we can take a look into it. ~Ojasvi
@gauravsingla_ Mr Singla, we have replied to you via DM. Please check.~ Nandita
@info_rakesha Sir, we request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@thoongumoonji1 Hi, we have replied to you via DM. Please check.~ Nandita
@ReshmiVarma Ma'am, we have replied to you via DM. Please check.~ Nandita
@rinkleagravat Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @amitshrm448 Hi, you may visit https://t.co/BuI2YW1q56 for detailed information on permissible/prohibited articles in check-in/hand baggage. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Student Discount Flights - Upto 6% off and 10KG extra baggage | IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offer a great deal for students with special Student Discount, get upto 6% off on base fare and also get additional 10kg baggage allowance.

data.text: @DhariwalGeetika Ma'am, please know that it is mandatory to carry a hard copy of your student ID at the time of check-in for verification. You may also visit https://t.co/34crlZpUaJ for more information.~ Nandita
@rakthbeej Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to DM us your PNR so, we may check with our concerned team and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@hcmuleva Sir, free seats are subject to availability as the same is limited in inventory. Charges are only for preferred seat selection. You may opt for auto-assigned seats during web check-in to avoid any charges. ~Nandita

@cz_binance_6LH_ Hi, we regret to note this and are checking on the same with our Airport Team. Please allow us some time and you may also DM us for further communication on your raised concern. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@rajdeep_de12 Hi Rajdeep, at times, the seat cushion gets adrift from its Velcro and the same can be re-positioned with the help of our Cabin Crew Team. Please DM us your PNR so we may have this shared with our Concerned Team for further review. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Shrinterest Sir, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number so we may check on the same and advise. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@jprao1985 Hi, you can carry 5 kgs of properly packed Tirumala Laddu Prasadam in your Cabin Baggage. Please note that the same is subjected to the approval from Airport's Security ( CISF ) Team. ~Navi

@coolioboy23 Hi Aditya, we see our Airport Team was able to create a WoW Moment for Riya and hope the celebration gives her many happy memories. We wish Riya a very Happy Birthday and look forward to having you both onboard soon. 💙✈️ #HBD #goIndiGo ~Navi
@mun_rav Hi, we regret the experience and would like to look into this. Could you please DM us your PNR for the same so we may check ? Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@ashishphadtare Mr Phadtare, we are checking on this with our concerned Airport Team and will try to update you ASAP. Please DM us the Brand of your Mobile to check further. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@cdeokar Hi, we regret the inconvenience and will have your feedback shared with our concerned Airport Team. Please DM us your PNR for the same and we wish you a comfortable time onboard our flight. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@SatyrsRespite Mr Singh, we appreciate you letting us know of the same and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may have your feedback shared with our Concerned Team. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@RevatinandanaD Sir, we understand your concern and request you to DM us your Contact Number, so we may get in touch with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@IndiGo6E Mr Kumar, we believe you have received your luggage as of now. We regret the delay and look forward to serving you in a better way in the near future. ~Navi
@ChapppanTikli Thanks for your valuable feedback. We are elated to note the same and look forward to having you onboard soon again. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi
@haripra44891629 We appreciate you letting us know of the same and will have your kind words shared with Sidharth. Looking forward to having you onboard soon again. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi
@rajeevchapra Mr Kumar, we regret the inconvenience and are checking on the same with our concerned Airport Team. Requesting your patience on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@Sum_pra13 Hi, we are here to assist and request you to DM us your PNR so we may check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@rajshrisahu00 Thanks for the #Shotout Ms Sahu, and we hope you are doing fine now. Our team is always there to assist you and we look forward to having you onboard soon again. ✈️ #goIndiGo ~Navi

@DevanshSaluja Sir, we always try and deliver the baggage in the same condition we receive it in, however, regret if this wasn't the case today. Could you share your PNR via DM? Let us get this checked quickly.~Shreya
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@RajPratapSingh Mr Singh, thank you for taking the time to meet us. We strive to deliver a seamless experience and this was truly not intended. We have taken your feedback into consideration and look forward to a more favorable experience on your future flights with us. ~Snigdha
@saralkk Sir, we regret to know the experience. Please allow us sometime to get it checked and update. ~Shreya
@donsunil79 This is concerning. We regret the delay, Sir. We wish to connect with you over the phone, could you please share the PNR along with your contact details to assist you further? ~Snigdha
@rksbhadoria3 Sir, please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Avinash91799964 Hi, we regret to inform 6E 2412 is delayed due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. The revised departure is 01:45 hrs. We'd request you to connect with our airport team for any real time assistance. ~Linda
@Premangkariya Mr Kariya, as informed via DM dry coconut/copra is prohibited for carriage. ~Linda
@p_moitra Mr Moitra, this sounds unusual. Please DM your PNR for us to check further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Saurabh26946436 As updated her luggage has been connected to the destination. You may collect the same. ~Snigdha 2/2

data.text: @Saurabh26946436 Mr Gautam, thank you for your time over the phone. While we didn’t intend the experience Ms Shivani had, we’d like to clarify that it is mandatory to clear the customs for the final destination. 1/2
@RahulSinhaTV Mr Sinha, it was indeed our pleasure to celebrate your day at 35000 ft. Once again, wishing you a very Happy Birthday. 💙 #GoIndiGo ~Linda
@_ShikharRaj Sir, as checked, there is no payment due & the booking is confirmed. ~Linda

@mayank_2045 Sir, we'll try our best to make her first flight a memorable one, although we cannot commit anything right now. Please allow us sometime to pass on your message to the airport team. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@IndiGo6E Further, we'll have your feedback shared with the catering team as well inflight team for necessary review which will help us enhance & deliver better services to you in the future. ~Linda (2/2)

data.text: @vjamritraj Mr Amritraj, sorry to find you disappointed. However, the coffee which is served on board is already a premix of milk & sugar, apart from black coffee. (1/2)
@gowthampmk Hi, indeed safety is for everyone. 😀 This picture is such a relief to our busy day. 💙 #GoIndiGo ~Linda
@itsVinayaithal Mr Aithal, we regret the experience. Please DM us the PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@AMITKUM00667868 Hi, this shouldn't have happened. Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@AadityaKulkar19 Mr Kulkarni, we’re constantly optimizing our schedule, and we will have your feedback sent to our Route Planning Team. ~Linda
@HmMehta65 Mr Mehta, we regret not delivering the service you opted for. Please DM us your PNR so we can check & assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@MaverickWorld_ Ma'am, we’re sad to know that, however, we wish to clarify that SLPC (Secondary Ladder Point Check) is performed as a secondary check and is done by the relevant airport security. We look forward to your understanding. ~Shreya
@shatamanyu Mr Mishra, sorry to find you disappointed. Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@toddshodd Hi, we regret to note your Sister's travel experience. Please DM us a bit more in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@im7manish Mr Kumar, we regret the schedule change. Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@DebpriyoDey Sir, we regret to see this. Our aircraft undergo deep cleaning on a daily basis and we have defined process to ensure the same.We'll share your feedback with the cleanliness department for review.  ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@JoeKing38955690 Sir, we never wanted to disappoint you. Watch queue restrictions are due to multiple reasons. Could you DM us your PNR so we can check? ~Shreya
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ANJOYNIRALA Sir, we regret the experience. Let us check and get back to you. ~Shreya

@krishnathakrani Mr Thakrani, as communicated by our customer relations team, we have taken this up with the relevant airport and no such incident was reported on arrival for us to act on it on priority. Request your kind understanding in this matter.~Shreya
@hashmiahmedsyed Fantastic click. 💙 #GoIndiGo

urls.title: 6E Tiffin: Snacks Menu, Pre-book Hygienic Snacks - IndiGo
urls.description: Pre-book your 6E Tiffin from our menu with hygienic & delicious snacks before your IndiGo flight. Only pre-booked snacks available! Book add-ons at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @eshitasolanki Ms Solanki, we’d like to clarify that a preferred meal can be pre booked here: https://t.co/NLFplFN7jU. We look forward to another opportunity to welcome you on board. ~Shreya
@gurdeepgill_1 Mr Gill, we take your safety very seriously so we would never ignore any sign of technical problems. We shall highlight it to the concerned team right away for necessary review. ~Linda
@mohitoz Be rest assured that your feedback is duly noted and has been highlighted further for a closer review. ~Shreya 2/2
@mohitoz Sir, we appreciate you taking the time to meet us. While we always strive to provide a pleasant experience when traveling with us, we regret the inconvenience caused on board. 1/2
